mapper.update:
update METER_REPLACE_INFO
METER_ID = #{meterId},
METER_ASSETS_ID = #{meterAssetsId},
CT_ASSETS_ID = #{ctAssetsId},
PT_ASSETS_ID = #{ptAssetsId},
TYPE_CODE = #{typeCode},
REASON = #{reason},
P1R0 = #{p1r0},
P2R0 = #{p2r0},
P3R0 = #{p3r0},
P4R0 = #{p4r0},
P5R0 = #{p5r0},
P6R0 = #{p6r0},
P7R0 = #{p7r0},
P8R0 = #{p8r0},
P1R1 = #{p1r1},
P2R1 = #{p2r1},
P3R1 = #{p3r1},
P4R1 = #{p4r1},
P5R1 = #{p5r1},
P6R1 = #{p6r1},
P7R1 = #{p7r1},
P8R1 = #{p8r1},
P1R2 = #{p1r2},
P2R2 = #{p2r2},
P3R2 = #{p3r2},
P4R2 = #{p4r2},
P5R2 = #{p5r2},
P6R2 = #{p6r2},
P7R2 = #{p7r2},
P8R2 = #{p8r2},
P1R3 = #{p1r3},
P2R3 = #{p2r3},
P3R3 = #{p3r3},
P4R3 = #{p4r3},
P5R3 = #{p5r3},
P6R3 = #{p6r3},
P7R3 = #{p7r3},
P8R3 = #{p8r3},
P1R4 = #{p1r4},
P2R4 = #{p2r4},
P3R4 = #{p3r4},
P4R4 = #{p4r4},
P5R4 = #{p5r4},
P6R4 = #{p6r4},
P7R4 = #{p7r4},
P8R4 = #{p8r4},
P1R5 = #{p1r5},
P2R5 = #{p2r5},
P3R5 = #{p3r5},
P4R5 = #{p4r5},
P5R5 = #{p5r5},
P6R5 = #{p6r5},
P7R5 = #{p7r5},
P8R5 = #{p8r5},
OPERATOR = #{operator},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
STATUS = #{status},
and ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ID,METER_ID,METER_ASSETS_ID,CT_ASSETS_ID,PT_ASSETS_ID,TYPE_CODE,REASON,P1R0,P2R0,P3R0,P4R0,P5R0,P6R0,P7R0,P8R0,P1R1,P2R1,P3R1,P4R1,P5R1,P6R1,P7R1,P8R1,P1R2,P2R2,P3R2,P4R2,P5R2,P6R2,P7R2,P8R2,P1R3,P2R3,P3R3,P4R3,P5R3,P6R3,P7R3,P8R3,P1R4,P2R4,P3R4,P4R4,P5R4,P6R4,P7R4,P8R4,P1R5,P2R5,P3R5,P4R5,P5R5,P6R5,P7R5,P8R5,OPERATOR,CREATE_DATE,STATUS from METER_REPLACE_INFO
METER_ID in (${_parameter}) and STATUS = 1

SELECT b.* FROM USER_METER_REL a LEFT JOIN METER_REPLACE_INFO b ON a.METER_ID = b.METER_ID
a.USER_ID in (${_parameter}) and b.STATUS = 1

SELECT c.* FROM USER_METER_REL a LEFT JOIN USER_INFO b ON a.USER_ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN METER_REPLACE_INFO c ON a.METER_ID = c.METER_ID
b.WRITE_SECT_ID in (${_parameter}) and c.STATUS = 1
